title: デビュー戦の後に・カワイイよ広がれ

text.jpText:
無事メイクデビューを果たしたカレンチャン。
SNSのコメントも大賑わい、
応援が嬉しいと喜んだのもつかの間……。
text.enText:
Curren Chan successfully made her debut. The 
comments on social networking sites were also 
very busy. I was happy to see the support and 
was also happy to see the ……

text.jpText:
よく見るとファンの大半は、
『走るカレン』には興味がなく、レースでの
注目度を高める必要を感じるカレンチャン。
text.enText:
If you look closely, you will see that most 
of the fans are not interested in the 
"running Curren" and feel that they need to 
pay more attention to her in the race. Curren 
Chan needs to be more visible in the races.

text.jpText:
というわけで、直近で目標レースは決めず、
しばらく『カワイイカレンチャン』の
知名度アップに努めることが決まった。
text.enText:
Therefore, it was decided that we would not 
set a target race for the near future, but 
would try for a while to increase We have 
decided not to set an immediate target race, 
but to work on raising the name recognition 
of Kawaii Currenchan for a while.
